# chamferMode

**Instance Property**

Determines if the front, back or both sides should be chamfered.

## Declaration

```swift
var chamferMode: MeshResource.ShapeExtrusionOptions.ChamferMode
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/MeshResource/ShapeExtrusionOptions/ChamferMode-swift.enum/both].
